definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

pinyin: yuan2 zi3 neng2 fa1 dian4 zhan4

sentences.english: It is the power behind a 880 megawatt hydroelectric generating station.
sentences.chinese: 它是一座880百萬瓦水力發電站的主要動力來源。

sentences.english: Authorities attributed this phenomenon to the country lacks water resources, hydroelectric power stations.
sentences.chinese: 當局將此現象歸咎於該國水力發電站的水力資源缺乏。

sentences.english: Its hyperbola ferroconcrete appearance became the typical symbol of power station.
sentences.chinese: 它的雙曲線鋼筋混凝土外形成了發電站的典型標誌。

sentences.english: It's because the skin is a real nutritional powerhouse.
sentences.chinese: 其實，土豆皮就像一所發電站，供給各種營養。

sentences.english: How tall is the wind turbine on Lamma Island?
sentences.chinese: 港燈位於南丫島上的風力發電站，風車高度爲多少米？

sentences.english: The remote county set up several middle-sized power stations in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 那個邊遠縣於1988年修建了幾座中型發電站。

sentences.english: What if your entire car was covered in these powerhouses?
sentences.chinese: 想想看，如果你的整部車都覆蓋上這種發電站會怎樣？

sentences.english: They set up several small power stations in 1980.
sentences.chinese: 他們於1980年建起了幾座小型發電站。
照片爲位於平湖的一座發電站。

sentences.english: The efficiency of Chinese power generation compares unfavourably with other countries.
sentences.chinese: 中國發電站的效率遠低於其他國家。

sentences.english: This is an electric station. The access there is restricted now due to commissioning operations.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個發電站，現在這裏由於委託運營，訪問受限。

sentences.english: Waste heat accounts for about 40% of the energy produced by power stations.
sentences.chinese: 餘熱約佔發電站產生能源的40%。

sentences.english: A consortium of construction companies will build the power-station.
sentences.chinese: 由建築公司組成的集團將建造該發電站。

sentences.english: Hitachi's sprawling business makes everything, from power stations to fridges.
sentences.chinese: 從發電站到冰箱，日立公司的業務已延伸至各個領域。

sentences.english: You can find it on the bank of the Dnieper, several kilometers far from the Kiev Hydroelectric Power Station.
sentences.chinese: 它位於聶伯河岸邊，距基輔水利發電站數千米。

sentences.english: A consortium of construction companies will build the power-station.
sentences.chinese: 由建公司組成的集團將建造該發電站。
